title: Vending machines : sales volume of vended products 2010
summary: In general Vended volume (in billion U.S. dollars) has rose over the Year.

Vended volume (in billion U.S. dollars) is slightly increasing from 1999 to 2001, roughly constant from 2001 to 2002, slightly increasing from 2002 to 2005, and lastly roughly constant from 2005 to 2007.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2000 and 2001.
Maximum Vended volume (in billion U.S. dollars), about 47.5 was reported at Year 2007
The lowest Vended volume (in billion U.S. dollars), of value 36.6 was reported at Year 1999
